r.s: Some small classes to handle common <select> lists
r.d: Provides <select>lists for: o Country o UK counties o US States o FR Departements o NO Fylke o NO Kommuner o ptBR
r.n: QA release Bug #14971 PHPCS tabs vs spaces kguest Request #6163 [Feature]-ptBRState - new file cweiske Bug #5050 State abbreviations wrong derick Corrected US states and added Norwegian Fylke and Kommuner
